it.apice.sapere.api - package it.apice.sapere.api
This package is the root of all SAPERE system interfaces.
it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws - package it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws
This package contains the definition of SAPERE Ecolaws and relatives.
it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.filters - package it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.filters
This package contains the definition of SAPERE Ecolaw filters.
it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.formulas - package it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.formulas
This package contains the definition of SAPERE Ecolaw's annotated variable's formula.
it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.scheduling - package it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.scheduling
This package contains the definition of SAPERE Ecolaw ratings, involved in ecolaw scheduling logic.
it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.terms - package it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.terms
This package contains the definition of SAPERE Ecolaw terms.
it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.terms.observers - package it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.terms.observers
This package contains the definition of SAPERE Ecolaws and relatives (ecolaws.terms.observers).
it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.visitor - package it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.visitor
This package contains the definition of an Ecolaw visitor.
it.apice.sapere.api.internal - package it.apice.sapere.api.internal
This package contains internal entities that will not be provided outside the bundle.
it.apice.sapere.api.lsas - package it.apice.sapere.api.lsas
This package contains the definition of a Live Semantic Annotation (LSA) and relatives.
it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.values - package it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.values
This package contains the definition of property values supported types.
it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.visitor - package it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.visitor
This package contains the definition of an LSA visitor.
it.apice.sapere.api.space - package it.apice.sapere.api.space
This package contains LSA-space interfaces.
it.apice.sapere.api.space.core - package it.apice.sapere.api.space.core
This package contains LSA-space internals interfaces.
it.apice.sapere.api.space.core.strategy - package it.apice.sapere.api.space.core.strategy
This package contains LSA-space strategy customization pipeline definition.
it.apice.sapere.api.space.match - package it.apice.sapere.api.space.match
This package contains the definition of SAPERE Ecolaw matching information.
it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation - package it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation
This package contains LSA-space observation features.
